title: Table 604.4 — Maximum Flow Rates and Consumption for Plumbing Fixtures and Fixture Fittings

content.heading: Table 604.4 — Maximum Flow Rates and Consumption for Plumbing Fixtures and Fixture Fittings

table: | Plumbing Fixture or Fixture Fitting      | Maximum Flow Rate or Quantity             |
| Lavatory, public (metering)              | 0.25 gallon per metering cycle            |
| Lavatory, public (other than metering)   | 0.5 gpm at 60 psi                          |
| Water closet                             | 1.6 gallons per flushing cycle            |

content.text: > a. A handheld shower spray is a shower head.
> b. Consumption tolerance shall be determined from referenced standards.
> For SI: 1 gallon = 3.785 L, 1 gallon per minute = 3.785 L/min, 1 pound per square inch = 6.895 kPa.
